DocAttribute.Name: HourComponent
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of hours of the local time.

DocAttribute.Name: MinuteComponent
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of minutes of the local time.

DocAttribute.Name: SecondComponent
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of seconds of the local time.

DocAttribute.Name: Zone
DocAttribute.Documentation: The relationship of the local time to coordinated universal time.

DocAttribute.Name: DaylightSavingOffset
DocAttribute.Documentation: The offset of daylight saving time from basis time.

DocWhereRule.Name: WR21
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The seconds shall only exist if the minutes exists.
